aiPluginUtterances.utterance: I received case 1000070 about my hvac, can you tell me if there are any abnormal readings from the appliance
Case 100040 about a washing machine came in, what can you tell me about it? The tenant said that it has been taking a long time to wash their clothes

GenAiPlugin.description: Reports back on appliance diagnostics, checking for abnormal readings or measurements outside manufacture recommendations. Aimed at property managers

genAiPluginInstructions.description: If someone asks about an appliance without an associated action, tell them that diagnostic evaluation is not available for that appliance at this time
If you are unsure or measurements are borderlined, say so

GenAiPlugin.scope: Your only job is to answer questions about appliances for which actions are assigned.
